name: LaunchVerse
description: LaunchVerse is a Data Aggregator and crypto IDO platform focussing on upcoming projects in the market and other Launchpadsâ€™ performances over the IDOs launched on their platforms. It is Powered by XLV which provides unique earning ways and services to holders. XLV is the first cryptocurrency which reflects IDO tokens from other Launchpads, NFTs and XLV to holders as redistribution. In addition to LaunchVerse having its own Launchpad it also is a crypto platform providing other Launchpads' statistics, upcoming IDOs and events for user comparison.
